geotextile_catalog.pdf.description: Complete range of woven and nonwoven geotextiles manufactured for civil engineering applications. Includes technical specifications, GSM ranges (100-800), tensile strength data, and standard roll sizes. Covers separation, filtration, drainage, reinforcement, and erosion control products with ASTM and ISO testing standards.

coastal_protection_guide.pdf.description: Specialized technical guide for coastal protection using high-strength woven geotextiles (400-800 GSM). Includes design guidelines for seawalls, revetments, and shoreline stabilization. Features installation methods, anchor systems, and case studies from marine environments. Covers UV resistance and saltwater durability specifications.

road_construction_solutions.pdf.description: Comprehensive guide for nonwoven geotextiles in road construction (150-400 GSM). Covers soil separation, subgrade stabilization, and pavement drainage applications. Includes AASHTO M288 specifications, CBR design values, and installation procedures. Features case studies from highway projects and trafficking guidelines.
